statmagic_backend.dev.match_stack_raster_tools module

statmagic_backend.dev.match_stack_raster_tools.add_matched_arrays_to_data_raster(data_raster_filepath, matched_arrays, description_list)[source]

Adds matched_arrays to the data raster along with their descriptions.

Parameters:

  • data_raster_filepath (str) – Path to the data raster

  • matched_arrays (ndarray) – Array containing subarrays for each match

  • description_list (list) – List of descriptions

Notes

No return value. Writes directly to the raster file.

statmagic_backend.dev.match_stack_raster_tools.drop_selected_layers_from_raster(data_raster_filepath, list_of_bands)[source]

Removes selected bands from the data raster.

Parameters:

  • data_raster_filepath (str) – Path to the data raster

  • list_of_bands (list) – Bands to remove

Notes

No return value. Overwrites the raster file.

statmagic_backend.dev.match_stack_raster_tools.match_and_stack_rasters(template_path, input_raster_paths_list, resampling_method_list, num_threads=1)[source]

Serves as the backend of the add raster layers to the data stack tool. Lists should be created coming from the QDialog and QListView.

Parameters:

  • template_path (str) – Path to the template raster

  • input_raster_paths_list (list) – List of file paths (str) to input rasters

  • resampling_method_list (list) – Resampling method to apply

  • num_threads (int) – Number of threads to utilize for the resampling

Returns:

array_stack – Array with dimensions (number of input files, height and width of template)

Return type:

ndarray

Warning

Defaults to float32 datatype.

statmagic_backend.dev.match_stack_raster_tools.match_raster_to_template(template_path, input_raster_path, resampling_method=Resampling.bilinear, num_threads=1)[source]

Clip and reproject an input raster to another rasters extent, crs, and affine transform. There could still be some room to add in some subtle shifts to better match pixel edges.

Parameters:

  • template_path (str) – Path to the template raster

  • input_raster_path (str) – Path to the input raster

  • resampling_method (str) –

    Resampling method. Must conform to rasterio.warp.Resampling(), i.e. be one of

    [
    'nearest', 'bilinear', 'cubic', 'cubic_spline',
    'lanczos', 'average', 'mode', 'gauss'
]

  • num_threads (int) – Number of threads to utilize for the resampling

Returns:

reproj_arr – Array representing the dimensions of the template raster

Return type:

ndarray
